      • applicationName

        Moonshine.Builder applicationName(String applicationName)

      • arguments

        Moonshine.Builder arguments(String[] arguments)
        Sets program arguments.

        Usually this will be the value of argv parameter from main(String[]) method.

      • skipUncaughtExceptionHandler

        Moonshine.Builder skipUncaughtExceptionHandler()
        Do not register uncaught exception handler.

      • addParameterProcessor

        Moonshine.Builder addParameterProcessor(ParameterProcessor parameterProcessor)
        Adds parameter processor.

        Moonshine parses the parameters using JCommander. The provided object will be added to the list of parameter processors with JCommander.addObject(Object).

      • skipDefaultConfigurationFiles

        Moonshine.Builder skipDefaultConfigurationFiles()
        Description copied from interface: Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder
        Skips default configuration files.

        By default '/default-config.xml' classpath resource and ${configHome}/config.xml configuration files are read. This option ignores them.

        Specified by:
        skipDefaultConfigurationFiles in interface Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder

      • addOptionalConfigurationFromResource

        Moonshine.Builder addOptionalConfigurationFromResource(String config)
        Description copied from interface: Moonshine.RestrictedBuilder

        Ignores the resource, if it does not exist.

      • build

        @Nullable
Moonshine build()
                throws MoonshineException,
                       IOException
        Builds Moonshine based on this builder parameters.

        Can return null, if based on provided configuration Moonshine container is not supposed to be built. For instance, when '--help' command line parameter is provided Moonshine logs help message and exits immediately.

        Returns:
        created Moonshine container, or null if intended behavior is to skip container creation
        Throws:
        IOException - when configuration could not be accessed
        org.atteo.evo.config.IncorrectConfigurationException - when configuration is incorrect
        MoonshineException
